description: Keeping your floors clean has never been easier, thanks to the Samsung POWERbot R9000 Robot Vacuum. An onboard digital camera and nine individual smart sensors allow this powerful robot vacuum to detect furniture and other obstacles to create the optimal cleaning path. And thanks to design innovations like CycloneForce suction, EasyPass Wheels and a carefully engineered Combo Brush, your little helper can easily maneuver over any surface without clogging, losing suction or getting stuck. All you have to do is turn it on, sit back and let this smart little vacuum do all the work for you.
title: Samsung POWERbot R9000 RoboticVacuum - VR2AK9000UG/AA

bullets: Robotic vacuum cleaner holds 0.7L (23.6oz) of dust

EasyPass wheels move smoothly over carpets and hard floors
FullView Sensor and Visionary Mapping creates the optimal path while avoiding furniture
Washable vacuum filter makes maintenance easy and cost-effective

description: Hello. My name is Rogue and I’m here to make your life easier. I’m not just (a) robot, I’m a smart vacuum that comes fully loaded with the latest and greatest tech. I have some pretty impressive features that really set me apart from those other robots. I have Robart® Mapping Technology with Memory, meaning I intelligently navigate and remember your floorplan instead of just randomly bumping around. I also have SmartWall Technology which allows you to mark rooms or areas as off limits to me through the Hoover Home App. Who else can brag about that? With other outstanding features like voice control, Wi-Fi connectivity, dirt detection and user indicator lights, I’m pretty much the whole package.

description: The Kobot RV351 has all the features to make your life easier. When the battery is running low, it will start its journey back to the home base and auto charge the battery. No need to worry if cleaning near stairs; this machine is equipped with fall prevention sensors. No need to worry about cleaning near furniture, this machine has touch sensitive bumpers that won't harm your furniture or wall baseboards. No need to worry about room coverage, this machine has factory, preprogrammed intelligent movement patterns for maximum room coverage. Kobot RV351 has a feature called Double Clean, with the press of the button the Kobot will clean the space and return to the charge station to recharge. Once charged the Kobot will venture back out to clean the space again. Kobot RV351 also has the Scheduling feature, which allows you choose when you would like the Kobot to clean the space by setting the time on the recharge base. These feature allows for the space to be cleaned twice automatically saving you time and energy!
title: KOBOT Slim Series Robot Vacuum With Scheduling - Silver (RV351)

bullets: Auto Re-Charge Home Base

Scheduling

bullets: Neato Boundary Maker lets you decide where your Neato robot can clean and where it should "Keep Out"
Easily cut the magnetic strip to fit doorways, around pet bowls, thick carpeted top stairs, or anywhere you don't want your Neato robot to go
Compatable with Neat Botvac Series, Neato Botvac D Series, Neato Botvac Connected and Neato XV Series robots

The Neato Botvac D Series Side Brush helps you get deep into corners and right up against walls and base boards to endure superior cleaning coverage. description: With the BLACK+DECKER HRV425BL SMARTECH Cordless Lithium Robotic Vacuum, Keeping Up Just Got Easier.  The extra large dustbin (1 Liter) holds 2X more debris than the competition so you can clean more between empties.  With an extra-wide cleaning path and up to 90 minutes of runtime, this robotic vacuum keeps crumbs, allergens and dirt under control.  The LED top cover flashes troubleshooting alerts to display the source of errors or maintenance needs, eliminating guesswork.  AUTOSENSE automatically adjusts suction power from hard floors to carpet, so you get more power when you need it and long battery life too.  This robot vacuum automatically docks and recharges, so its ready for the next cleaning and its sensors detect stairs and other drop-offs.  2 side sweepers clean dust and debris along edges and in corners in addition to the extra wide 9" beater bar that snaps in and out for easy maintenance.  You can select from 3 cleaning modes to fit your needs: Spot Clean, Quick, and Auto or choose manual drive for full control of the cleaning area.  Conveniently control and schedule your vacuum or personalize the illuminated LED cover to match your color style with the free BLACK+DECKER smartphone app.  This vacuum has Bluetooth capability.  Kit includes: (1) Lithium Robot vacuum, (1) Charging Base, (4) Side Sweepers, (2) HEPA Filters, (1) Multi-Purpose Beater Bar, (1) Beater Bar Cleaning Tool, and (1) Screwdriver.  1 Year Limited Warranty.
title: BLACK+DECKER™ SMARTECH™ Lithium Robotic Vacuum with LED Titanium - HRV425BL
bullet_description: Includes: Instruction manual, rechargeable battery, charging base

Features: LED Display, Bluetooth enabled, battery charge indicator, automatic docking, LED Charging Indicator Light, Rechargable, Portable, Self Propelled, motorized, low profile, detachable canister, 360-degree Swivel, On/Off Switch, Easy-empty Dirt Container, Filter, Fingertip Controls
Item Type: Laundry, Cleaning, Closet: Robotic vacuums
Recommended Surface Application: Multi-surface, Carpet, Hard Floor, Hardwood

description: Keep the smaller spaces in your home neat and clean with the RV001 Hand-Held Vacuum from Techko Maid. This hand-held vacuum can be used on your desktop, computer keyboard and is perfect for kitchen counters and any tabletops. It can even be used to remove dog hair or lint on your clothing. This compact vacuum is the perfect size to fit in your purse or backpack for cleaning on the go or quick cleanups in your vehicle.
title: Techko Maid Hand Held Vacuum - RV001

bullets: Battery-operated hand-held vacuum
Easy fingertip controls
Requires 2 AA batteries, not included

description: The Hom-Bot Sweet & Mop Robotic Vacuum from LG is the perfect cleaning tool for any home. This adaptive vacuum works on any type of floor, from carpet to hardwood and more. With seven different cleaning modes, you'll find the perfect setting to sweep, vacuum and mop away whatever mess you may find. This square robot vacuum runs quietly for up to 100 minutes to get your whole home looking clean and fresh.
title: LG Hom-Bot Sweep & Mop Robotic Vacuum - Black

bullets: Quiet robotic vacuum
Corner Master feature cleans along edges and in corners
Sweeps, vacuums and mops
Easy-to-empty dirt container
